verses.verse: Now the Philistines<WH6430> took<WH3947> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> and brought<WH935> it from Ebenezer<WH72> to Ashdod.<WH795>
Then the Philistines<WH6430> took<WH3947> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> and brought<WH935> it to the house<WH1004> of Dagon,<WH1712> and set<WH3322> it by Dagon.<WH1712>

When the Ashdodites<WH796> arose<WH7925> early<WH7925> the next<WH4283> morning,<WH4283> behold,<WH2009> Dagon<WH1712> had fallen<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the ground<WH776> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord.<WH3068> So they took<WH3947> Dagon<WH1712> and set<WH7725> him in his place<WH4725> again.<WH7725>

But when they arose<WH7925> early<WH7925> the next<WH4283> morning,<WH1242> behold,<WH2009> Dagon<WH1712> had fallen<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the ground<WH776> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord.<WH3068> And the head<WH7218> of Dagon<WH1712> and both<WH8147> the palms<WH3709> of his hands<WH3027> [were] cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> on the threshold;<WH4670> only<WH7534> the trunk of Dagon<WH1712> was left<WH7604> to him.

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> neither<WH3808> the priests<WH3548> of Dagon<WH1712> nor<WH3808> all<WH3605> who enter<WH935> Dagon<WH1712>'s house<WH1004> tread<WH1869> on the threshold<WH4670> of Dagon in Ashdod<WH795> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

Now the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> was heavy<WH3513> on the Ashdodites,<WH796> and He ravaged<WH8074> them and smote<WH5221> them with tumors,<WH9425> both Ashdod<WH795> and its territories.<WH1366>

When the men<WH376> of Ashdod<WH795> saw<WH7200> that it was so,<WH3651> they said,<WH559> "The ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> must not remain<WH3427> with us, for His hand<WH3027> is severe<WH7185> on us and on Dagon<WH1712> our god.<WH430>"

So they sent<WH7971> and gathered<WH622> all<WH3605> the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> to them and said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> shall we do<WH6213> with the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>?" And they said,<WH559> "Let the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> be brought<WH5437> around<WH5437> to Gath.<WH1661>" And they brought<WH5437> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> [around.]

And it came<WH1961> about that after<WH310> they had brought<WH5437> it around,<WH5437> the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> was against the city<WH5892> with very<WH3966> great<WH1419> confusion;<WH4103> and He smote<WH5221> the men<WH376> of the city,<WH5892> both<WH4480> young<WH9512> and old,<WH1419> so that tumors<WH9425> broke<WH8368> out on them.

So they sent<WH7971> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> to Ekron.<WH6138> And it happened<WH1961> as the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to Ekron<WH6138> that the Ekronites<WH6139> cried<WH2199> out, saying,<WH559> "They have brought<WH5437> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> around<WH5437> to us, to kill<WH4191> us and our people.<WH5971>"

They sent<WH7971> therefore and gathered<WH622> all<WH3605> the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> and said,<WH559> "Send<WH7971> away<WH7971> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> and let it return<WH7725> to its own place,<WH4725> that it may not kill<WH4191> us and our people.<WH5971>" For there was a deadly<WH4194> confusion<WH4103> throughout<WH3605> the city;<WH5892> the hand<WH3027> of God<WH430> was very<WH3966> heavy<WH3513> there.<WH8033>
And the men<WH376> who<WH834> did not die<WH4191> were smitten<WH5221> with tumors<WH9425> and the cry<WH7775> of the city<WH5892> went<WH5927> up to heaven.<WH8064>
